item.title: Police LT Mike Madden Paints Picture of Jihadi Death
item.description: https://youtu.be/siLsflWdhz8 Remarkable account of massacre by a police lieutenant who arrived first on the scene in San Bernardino. Notice the difference between his reaction and the reactions of the left. H/T Lee Presser.
